class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.audit.AudPendingSample
class.comment: Audit of autoaccession sponsor sample information

column.name: CHANGE_REASON_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the reason for change in change_reason table

column.name: PENDING_SAMPLE_ID
column.comment: Pending sample identifier and primary key.

column.name: SPONSOR_SAMPLE_TUBE_ID
column.comment: Sponsor's sample tube identifier.

column.name: SPONSOR_ACCESSION_ID
column.comment: Sponsor's accession identifier.

column.name: STUDY_PROTOCOL_ID
column.comment: Study protocol identifier and foreign key to the STUDY_PROTOCOL table.

column.name: ACCESSION_ID
column.comment: Accession identifier and foreign key to the ACCESSION table.

column.name: SAMPLE_ID
column.comment: Sample identifier and foreign key to the SAMPLE table.

column.name: AUTOACCESSION_LOAD_ID
column.comment: Autoaccession load identifier and foreign key to the AUTOACCESSION_LOAD table.

column.name: PENDING
column.comment: Sample''s pending status, 0 = accessioned 1 = pending.

column.name: VOLUME
column.comment: Current sample amount.

column.name: CONCENTRATION
column.comment: The current sample concentration.

column.name: FINAL_STORAGE_TUBE
column.comment: Flag for whether or not the sample is ready for final disposition.

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.comment: What type of sample material is being accessioned (cells, whole blood, etc.).

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User who created this record.

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date this record was created.

column.name: ACCESSIONED_BY
column.comment: User who accessioned this sample.

column.name: DATE_ACCESSIONED
column.comment: Date this sample was accessioned.

column.name: CHANGED_BY
column.comment: User who caused this audit transaction to take place.

column.name: DATE_CHANGED
column.comment: Date this audit transaction took place.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Activity that triggered this audit transaction (mod or del).
